name: UNIVERSITY OF SOUTH FLORIDA
sampleDescriptions:
H.R. 976, to Grant a Federal Charter to the National Academy of Inventors, support of the bill;
S. 1390/H.R. 5340, the STRONGER Patents Act, support of the bill.

H.R. 1625, Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2018, provisions related to higher education and research funding;
FY 2019 Department of Defense Appropriations, provisions related to higher education and
General support for cybersecurity research and education programs.
General support for NIH research programs.

The Higher Education Act Reauthorization, provisions related to student success, federal financial aid, and student loan programs;
H.R. 4508, PROSPER Act, entire bill.
